Text: What does this fix actually fix? I installed some mods and now all the sudden i can't aim so I have to redownload the iso and install again...fortunately my saves and mods are safe i just have to make backups this time.

Works PERFECTLY! Thanks! thanks thanks THANKS! scanned with Avast, no virusses detected.. :)

It's a fix for the mouse in GTA, for people with problems like me.. I couldn't use my mouse AT ALL in the menu OR in the game.. Couldn't aim or anything.. I can now, thanks to this torrent :D
